339
March 8th 65
Hon E. M. Stanton
Secty of War
Washington D. C
Sir

I have the honor to request, that the veterans and recruits of the First and Second Ky Batteries numbering about forty six men, be consolidated with the First Kentucky Independent Battery, retaining the designation of the latter. The members of the 1s. and 2d Batteries are now serving in Ohio and Indiana batteries; I hope the necessary orders will be issued.

Very Respectfully
Your Obdt Servt
Thos E Bramlette
Governor of Ky
